description:
The Best cool browser games that you can play online

1. Agar.io - A multiplayer game where you start as a small cell and try to eat other cells to become larger and avoid being eaten by others.

2. Slither.io - Similar to Agar.io, but with snakes. You try to grow your snake by eating pellets and other snakes, while avoiding collision with other snakes.

3. 2048 - A puzzle game where you slide numbered tiles on a grid to combine them and reach the number 2048.

4. Cookie Clicker - A clicker game where you click a cookie to increase your baked goods production and earn cookies, which you can then use to buy upgrades.

5. Tetris - A classic puzzle game where you try to fit different shapes together to form horizontal lines and score points.

6. Pac-Man - Another classic game where you play as Pac-Man and try to eat all the dots in a maze while avoiding ghosts.

7. Super Mario Bros. Crossover - A fan-made game that allows you to play through the classic Super Mario Bros. levels as different characters from other games, such as Link from The Legend of Zelda or Mega Man.

8. Kingdom Rush - A tower defense game where you strategically place towers and defenses to fend off waves of enemies and protect your kingdom.

9. Little Alchemy - A puzzle game where you combine different elements to create new ones and eventually discover all 560 possible combinations.

10. GeoGuessr - A geography game where you are dropped in a random location on Google Street View and have to guess where you are based on clues in the surroundings.
name: cool browser games
